alert.note: Alert for Wahkiakum (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 2:16PM PST until December 12 at 2:33AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Washington... Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. For the Nw Oregon / Sw Washington Coast...including Rosburg...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Grays River near Rosburg. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...Above 12.0 feet, expect some flooding of roads along and near the Grays River, including roadway approaches to the Altoona Bridge over the Grays, and portions of Covered Bridge Road, Barr-Durrah Road, and Loop Road near Rosburg and Hwy 4. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - The river crested near 14.1 feet late Saturday morning. The river is near 13.5 feet as of Saturday afternoon and the river will continue to subside through tonight. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tonight. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 200 AM PST.
